docs.lead_paragraph: Lieut. D. D. PORTER, commanding the United States store-ship Supply, which is going to the Eastern world after a load of camels,--has made all arrangement by which his crew is to be shipped with the agreement that no grog shall be served on board. The men are to receive commutation for the liquor at the rate of sixpence a day. The abolition

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; POPULAR EDUCATION. A NEW SCHOOL-HOUSE. Dedication of Ward Sohool-House No. 4, and a Dinner to the Female Teachers, The Mayor's Office. ANOTHER LIQUOR DECISION. Corporation Counsellor Dillon on the Prohibitory Law. Board of Counollmen- FIRES. Fire in the St. Louis Hotel. The New-York Society Library.

docs.lead_paragraph: The ceremony of the dedication of Ward School No. 4, Rivington-street, near Ridge, took place yesterday. A large concourse assembled in the upper school room, principally composed of ladies, at an hour much earlier than was set apart according to the advertisement. The room was filled with the female pupils, who are to receive instruction in the new institution, who n the most orderly manner were marshaled and seated with their respective teachers.
docs.abstract: Opinion of Corp Counsel Dillon on the prohibitory Law

headline.main: LONG ISLAND.; Mortality in Brooklyn. Pickpockets in Church. Mayhem.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn Health Officer reports sixty.seven deaths as having occurred during the week ending the 21st inst., from the following DISEASES-Apoplexy, asthma, burned, cancer, cancer In stomach, cholera infantum, congestion of the brain, croup, delirium tremens, diarrhea, dropsy, do. heart, fever puerperel, do. typhoid, hemorrhage, do. bladder,

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr.BRIGHT has been making a speech at Manchester on the mismanagement of the war. Mr. BRIGHT is one of those rare gentlemen who take the liberty of making up their own opinions, and of that still rarer class who, when they talk, speak for themselves, instead of somebody else.

docs.lead_paragraph: The last of these excellent entertainments attracted an overflowing house on Saturday evening. We hope to see this prosperous Association in a still larger building next season. The Academy of Music could as casily be filled as Niblo's, if attractive programmes appealing to a classic but not ponderous taste are offered.

docs.lead_paragraph: We have no particulars yet of Dr. PECK'S arrest in the Island of Cuba, nor have we the slightest hint so far of the charge or charges preferred against him. headline.main: ONE WEEK LATER FROM EUROPE; ARRIVAL OF THE NASHVILLE. BLOODY WORK AT SEBASTOPOL, FIGHT ON THE 22d MARCH. HEAVY FRENCH AND RUSSIAN LOSS Advantage Claimed by Both Parties. VIENNA CONFERENCE ADJUOURNED TO APRIL 9 HOPES OF PEACE DIMINISHED, Bank of England Rate of Interest Reduced British Funds 92 5-8. Large Sales of Cotton--Prices Rising.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States mail steamer Nashville, from Liverpool 3 P. M. Saturday, the 7th inst., arrived at this port yesterday, noon. The Nashville reports her own arrival at Liverpool at 9 o'clock on the morning of Tuesday, the 3d inst.
